<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4224</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Strategies for dealing with a dyslexic child</string>
            <string language="es">Estrategias para tratar con la dislexia infantil</string>
            <string language="ga">Straitéisí le déileáil le dalta atá disléicseach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strategien für das Beschäftigen ein dyslexic 
Kind</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Stratégies pour avoir affaire avec un enfant 
dyslexique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estratégias para tratar de uma criança 
dyslexic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strategie per trattare con un bambino dyslexic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στρατηγικές για ένα δυσλεκτικό παιδί</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This advice sheet is aimed at children with special needs(Dyslexia). It offers strategies for dealing with this disability in a classroom situation.</string>
            <string language="es">Esta hoja de consejos está dirigida a niños con necesidades especiales (Dislexia). Ofrece estrategias para tratar esta discapacidad en una situación de clase.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tá an bileog chomhairle seo dírithe ar dhaltaí le riachtanais speisialta (Disléicse). Tugann sé straitéisí chun déileáil leis an míchumas seo sa seomra ranga.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">General</string>
            <string language="es">General. Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Ginearálta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Rateblatt ist- angestrebte Kinder mit 
speziellem needs(Dyslexia). Es bietet Strategien für das 
Beschäftigen diese Unfähigkeit in einer Klassenzimmersituation an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette feuille de conseil est les enfants 
visés avec needs(dyslexie) spécial. Elle offre des stratégies
pour traiter cette incapacité dans une situation de salle de classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta folha do conselho é crianças visadas com 
needs(Dyslexia) especial. Oferece estratégias para tratar desta
inabilidade em uma situação da sala de aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo foglio di consiglio è bambini puntati su 
con needs(Dyslexia) speciale. Offre le strategie per occuparsi 
di questa inabilità in una situazione dell'aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το φύλλο συμβουλών στοχεύουν στα παιδιά με 
ειδικές ανάγκες (δυσλεξία). Προσφέρει τις στρατηγικές για 
αυτήν την ανικανότητα σε μια κατάσταση τάξεων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Allgemein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Généralités</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Generalità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γενικό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
